default: 1 eating apple, cored and finely chopped
1 tbsp fresh herbs, parsley, thyme, sage or tarragon, chopped

steps: Mix together the apple, breadcrumbs and herbs and season well.
Add enough of the egg to bind all together and use to stuff meat or poultry or roll into individual stuffing balls.
If making stuffing balls, bake in the oven with the meat for 30 minutes.
tips: If you are making this as a dairy-free recipe, take care to ensure the breadcrumbs are dairy free. Although many breads contain dairy, free-from options are widely available - just check the label.
title: Apple and herb stuffing
